title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status Snapshot

view.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status
view.subtitle: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

blocks.title: Member Review Bookings completed
blocks.message: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

resultPayload.note: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

requestBody.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status API Trace

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).
Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.
